comment: THIS IS A TEMPLATE FILE. The actual historical-prices.json should be placed in the ouzayr/Stock-scrapper-public repository at the root level. The frontend will fetch it from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ouzayr/Stock-scrapper-public/main/historical-prices.json
instruction: This file is automatically updated by the monthly consolidation GitHub Action. Do not edit manually.
note: Historical price data is grouped by symbol. Each entry includes: date (YYYY-MM-DD), price (closing price). Data is consolidated monthly from daily scrapes.
